decision_conditions: The applicant has failed to demonstrate, with the submission of details, that the landscaping scheme would successfully preserve and enhance the visual amenities of the locality and provide adequate facilities, failing to comply with policies DMHB 11, DMHB 12, DMHB 14, DMEI 1 and DMT 2 of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part Two - Development Management Policies and Policy G5 of the London Plan (2021).

The applicant has failed to demonstrate, with the lack of a parking allocation plan, that an appropriate level of car parking provision is provided on site in accordance with Policy DMT 6 of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part Two - Development Management Policies (2020) and Policy T6 of the London Plan (2021).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Condition 3 (Parking Allocation) 4 (landscape scheme) of planning permission ref. 17938/APP/2023/2375, dated 15-11-2023 (Conversion of the existing house to 2 flats)
